About the Channel

Rob Trek, known as ‚ÄúThe Guy with a Camera,‚Äù is widely regarded as one of the best Olympus/OM System educators on YouTube. Working full-time in real estate, Rob dedicates his passion to creating easy-to-understand photography tutorials. Despite receiving no official support from Olympus/OM System, he has helped millions of photographers master their cameras and has generated countless sales for the brand through his clear, accessible teaching.

Content Style

  • Step-by-step tutorials that make complex features simple
  • Menu deep-dives showing exactly where every setting lives
  • Real-world photo walks demonstrating techniques in action
  • No clickbait - honest, straightforward content
  • Patient teaching perfect for beginners and intermediates

Why We Recommend This Channel

Rob Trek‚Äôs teaching style is understated but incredibly effective. He doesn‚Äôt chase views with sensational titles - instead, he focuses on genuinely helping people understand their cameras. His videos on menu navigation, exposure techniques, and camera settings have become essential viewing for Olympus/OM System users. Many consider him to have done more for Olympus users than anyone else on the planet.

Best For

  • New Olympus/OM System camera owners
  • Those struggling with the complex menu system
  • Learning exposure techniques and metering modes
  • Understanding specific camera features in depth
  • Practical, real-world photography applications

‚ÄúI strive to make photography easy and fun!‚Äù Rob‚Äôs approach emphasizes:

  • Breaking down complexity into manageable steps
  • Showing, not just telling through demonstrations
  • Real-world application over theory
  • Accessibility for photographers of all skill levels

Notable Contributions

Exposure Excellence: His video on exposure techniques, highlight/shadow warning thresholds, and ETTR (Expose To The Right) is considered essential viewing.
